CustomField.description: Block DMLs in the StepFunction's initRecordProcessing and finishRecordProcessing methods. The system will throw BoostException when the code will execute a DML operation.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Block DMLs in the StepFunction's initRecordProcessing and finishRecordProcessing methods. The system will throw BoostException when the code will execute a DML operation.
CustomField.label: Block DMLs in record level processing
